Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

AIL_start_timer

The function AIL_start_timer initiates or resumes periodic time-slice interrupt service to the callback function registered to timer.

void AIL_start_timer(
  HTIMER timer
);

In Parameters

timer
is a handle to the timer to start.


Group: Timer Services
Related Functions: AIL_register_timer, AIL_stop_timer
Related Basic Types: HTIMER, void
